title: Google\Cloud\Dataplex\V1\Task
name: Task
description:
A task represents a user-visible job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataplex.v1.Task

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The relative resource name of the task, of the form: projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}/ tasks/{task_id}.

params.name: data.uid
params.description: Output only. System generated globally unique ID for the task. This ID will be different if the task is deleted and re-created with the same name.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The time when the task was created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The time when the task was last updated.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. Description of the task.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Optional. User friendly display name.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. Current state of the task.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Optional. User-defined labels for the task.

params.name: data.trigger_spec
params.description: Required. Spec related to how often and when a task should be triggered.

params.name: data.execution_spec
params.description: Required. Spec related to how a task is executed.

params.name: data.spark
params.description: Config related to running custom Spark tasks.
